name: Operation Space Force
description:
Join Operation Space Force, a free-to-play team-based shooter that takes place in space.

KEY FEATURES

With 6+ unique characters on the roster, experiment with their speed and power. Select the one who shall deem you victorious in the arena.


There are four slots: Two to choose from between 13+ guns, one to select from 2+ grenades, and one for a knife. Weapon customization allows you to change certain parts of the gun and offers a variety of skins.


Roam in 4+ different maps, where two maps will stay the same, while three maps will change every time a new match is loaded.


Join a team and play up to 5+ game modes. Host a game, have the freedom to decide the gameplay, and create. Joining a game is perfectly optional as well.
